meanings.sent1: My friend is a big liker of chocolate ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The liker of art enjoyed visiting the museum.
meanings.sent3: The liker of spicy food always carries hot sauce in their bag.
meanings.sent4: She was a liker of adventure, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The liker of puzzles spent hours solving crosswords.

meanings.definition: One who is fond of or has a preference for something.
meanings.sent1: As a liker of dogs, she volunteered at the animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: The liker of music had a vast collection of vinyl records.
meanings.sent3: The liker of rainy days found peace in the sound of falling drops.
meanings.sent4: He was a liker of classic cars, admiring their timeless design.
meanings.sent5: The liker of books could spend hours browsing in the bookstore.
